verbs.description: [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: scored] [ARG1: a media win] and went viral by beating Donald Trump at his own handshake game at a NATO summit last May.
[ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] scored a media win and [V: went] [ARG2: viral] [ARGM-MNR: by beating Donald Trump at his own handshake game at a NATO summit last May.]

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] scored a media win and went viral by [V: beating] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at his own handshake game] [ARGM-LOC: at a NATO summit] [ARGM-TMP: last May.]
